modName: Orcrist Sword by Ryan Valle and Standalone09
summary: Adds a Unique 1h' 2h Sword to your game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://picload.org/image/irldwld/screenshot001.png[/img][img]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/img][/center]

[font=Garamond][size=5][color=#938953]Description:[/color][/size][/font]

I made this Sword after a concept made by the extremely talented Illustrator Ryan Valle so if you would check out his Webpage/Deviantart page and do your eyes something good for a change that would be great! :D 

[b][size=4][color=#ff0000]http://www.ryanvalle.com/[/color] [color=#00ffff]http://r-valle.deviantart.com/
[/color][/size][/b]


At the moment you can only download a craftable Version of the Sword 1handed + 2handed version.

[size=2](in the DAEDRIC CATEGORY) (yes you need the daedric smithing perk) (yes i know the ingredients dont make sense) (ಠ_ಠ)[/size]

[font=Garamond][size=5][color=#938953]Install:[/color][/size][/font]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the OrcristSword.esp 

[font=Garamond][size=5][color=#938953]Uninstall:[/color][/size][/font]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[center][img]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/img][/center]



Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without permission. Have fun!
author: Ryan Valle Standalone09
